text:
Having a rational & effective response to #COVID-19 will be hard to achieve as long as we have a heavily politicized narrative that demands you pick 1 of 2 views:

A. Virus is the apocalypse & everything must close; or

B. Virus is being exaggerated & will go away on its own

Every country,not just the U.S.,is having or will have a resurgence of new #COVID19 cases because certain human behaviors are universal:

-Cases spike, people get scared & take precautions & rate slows

-When rate improves people let their guard down & rate spikes http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EcZ6KzWWoAE0_U9.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EcZ6KzYWoAYORXW.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EcZ6KzZWsAMJE4h.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EcZ6KzXXYAAAm0h.jpg

Sow for yourselves justice, reap the reward of loyalty;Break up for yourselves a new field, for it is time to seek the LORD,
till he comes and rains justice upon you.”

Hosea 10:12

Congratulations to @Bonnie4Congress for winning her primary last night. I look forward to continue working with her in Congress to fight for working people across New Jersey and the entire country. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EcaZRe5WAAYTGdb.jpg

Wonderful: BIG victory for the Little Sisters of the Poor. 🙏🙏 https://twitter.com/lifenewshq/status/1280873948318597120 QT @LifeNewsHQ BREAKING NEWS:

Supreme Court Upholds Trump’s Order Protecting Little Sisters From Funding Abortions 

https://www.lifenews.com/2020/07/08/supreme-court-upholds-trumps-order-protecting-little-sisters-from-funding-abortions/

We need @drleovalentin in Congress!

I'm proud to endorse Leo today, and I hope you'll join me in supporting him for #FL07: https://secure.anedot.com/leo-valentin-for-congress/cac5d6a5f2ee6b094e85f

A shameful decision by the Supreme Court that will deny up to 126,000 employees birth control coverage. https://twitter.com/AP/status/1280868880567676931 QT @AP BREAKING: Supreme Court sides with Trump effort to let more employers out of health care law’s no-cost birth control requirement. https://apnews.com/U.S.SupremeCourt?utm_source=Twitter&utm_medium=AP&utm_campaign=SocialFlow

RT @usattycox How @USAO_EDTX is fighting CARES Act fraud, while taking care not to discourage legitimate businesses from accessing these important financial resources.  https://www.law.com/texaslawyer/2020/07/07/combating-cares-act-fraud-ensuring-economic-relief-for-americans-through-law-enforcement-efforts/

We need to follow the guidance of our health experts and ensure our children and teachers aren’t put into dangerous situations.
https://twitter.com/AP/status/1280559474210635783 QT @AP Education Secretary Betsy DeVos is assailing plans by some local districts to offer in-person instruction only a few days a week. She says schools must be “fully operational” even amid the pandemic and anything less fails students and taxpayers.  https://apnews.com/be1ed8b75986393fe0385cae85b6a6c8?utm_campaign=SocialFlow&utm_source=Twitter&utm_medium=AP

Despite being 30% of our population, Black & Latinx households own just 7.5% of our country's wealth while white households now own over 85%. We can virtually close this racial wealth gap is with Baby Bonds featured in my American Opportunity Accounts Act. https://www.nbcnews.com/think/opinion/black-americans-wealth-gap-ties-together-george-floyd-protests-coronavirus-ncna1232232

My heart grieves for every one of these women. We are not doing nearly enough to address the epidemic of violence against Black trans women in America. All of us must commit to fighting for the safety and security of the trans community.

Remember to say their names. https://twitter.com/TransLawCenter/status/1280155592917737473 QT @TransLawCenter Since last week, six Black trans women have been found dead. 

Repeat their names back aloud:

Brayla Stone. Little Rock, AR. 
Merci Mack. Dallas, TX. 
Shaki Peters, Amite City, LA. 
Draya McCarty, Baton Rouge, LA. 
Tatiana Hall, Philadelphia, PA. 
Bree Black, Pompano Beach, FL.

Should decisions on health care be determined by the patient? Or, should they be controlled by the whims of the employer? Today's Supreme Court decision makes it clear why health care is a human right, not an employee benefit, and why we must pass Medicare for All.

RT @Bonnie4Congress Grateful for you @BernieSanders! I'm looking forward to continuing to work with you on the critical issues that will help working families everywhere! https://twitter.com/BernieSanders/status/1280879796281643013 QT @BernieSanders Congratulations to @Bonnie4Congress for winning her primary last night. I look forward to continue working with her in Congress to fight for working people across New Jersey and the entire country. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EcaZRe5WAAYTGdb.jpg

The Supreme Court’s ruling to let employers deny birth control coverage is an attack on basic health care. It’s also an attack on economic freedom. #HandsOffMyBC
https://www.glamour.com/story/elizabeth-warren-attacks-on-birth-control-access-are-attacks-on-womens-freedom

“Paul’s proposal also would have rescinded the 18-year old Authorization for Use of Military Force whose statutory interpretation has stretched to such farcical heights that virtually any kinetic action against a terrorist group is considered covered...” https://www.defenseone.com/ideas/2020/07/ndaa-should-prompt-rethinking-costly-us-foreign-policy/166686/

Patients’ ability to get contraception shouldn’t be up to employers. It should be a decision between patients and their doctors. 

Health care—including birth control—is a right, not an employee benefit.

We must fight Trump’s rollback of these rights by passing Medicare for All. https://twitter.com/AP/status/1280868880567676931 QT @AP BREAKING: Supreme Court sides with Trump effort to let more employers out of health care law’s no-cost birth control requirement. https://apnews.com/U.S.SupremeCourt?utm_source=Twitter&utm_medium=AP&utm_campaign=SocialFlow

.@StateDept announced visa bans on Chinese officials for denying US diplomats, journalists, & others access to Tibet pursuant to Rubio's Reciprocal Access to Tibet Act. China’s leaders shouldn’t be able to enjoy freedoms in America while abusing the fundamental rights of Tibetans https://twitter.com/secpompeo/status/1280610317370884096 QT @SecPompeo Today I announced visa restrictions on PRC officials involved in restricting foreigners’ access to Tibet. We will continue to seek reciprocity in our relationship.

RT @EdMarkey It is the honor of a lifetime to work alongside brilliant leaders and activists like @AOC and the @sunrisemvmt. The grassroots movement to save our future is stronger than ever because of their hard work, leadership, and commitment to a just and equitable future for all. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EcWoLQUXsAIklNM.jpg

An incredibly moving and powerful message of hope for our future from @AdyBarkan. Our fight for progress is stronger with him by our side.
https://twitter.com/AdyBarkan/status/1280879315974930432 QT @AdyBarkan .@JoeBiden is everything Trump is not. He has turned loss into purpose: the purpose of public service.

Although he & I have different perspectives on the world, winning this election is essential.

Then we can continue our struggles for justice with a compassionate president. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1280851724639625216/img/PTm3CYAmfTauQdy2.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1280851724639625216/vid/480x270/yxiHF-NTK9lOWing.mp4?tag=13

Evidence that the CCP is terrified of independent thought:
❌Imprisoning millions of Uyghurs in “re-education camps”
❌Censoring the media and internet
❌Using technology to spy on and control its people

We must not turn a blind eye as China commits gross human rights abuses. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1280556705412243456/img/BfD6l_PI20MjlyoQ.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1280556705412243456/vid/480x270/5Yt-q2dkUIZWbisw.mp4?tag=13

United by our values and acting with purpose, there is no limit to the progress we can achieve together. 

We *will* strengthen our House Majority, take back the Senate and elect Joe Biden President of the United States. -NP https://twitter.com/adybarkan/status/1280879315974930432 QT @AdyBarkan .@JoeBiden is everything Trump is not. He has turned loss into purpose: the purpose of public service.

Although he & I have different perspectives on the world, winning this election is essential.

Then we can continue our struggles for justice with a compassionate president. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1280851724639625216/img/PTm3CYAmfTauQdy2.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1280851724639625216/vid/480x270/yxiHF-NTK9lOWing.mp4?tag=13

Employers should not be able to deny access to birth control coverage. It's outrageous that we're still having to debate this. Together we must stop these harmful attacks on reproductive freedom. 

Birth control is essential health care. https://twitter.com/ACLU/status/1280875605144285185 QT @ACLU BREAKING: The Supreme Court just sided with the Trump administration, ruling your employer or university can deny you birth control coverage based on a religious or moral objection.

We’ve said it before and we’ll say it again: Religious liberty is not a license to discriminate.

The Supreme Court’s decision to enable the Trump Admin’s assault on women’s health, financial security & independence is a fundamental misreading of the Affordable Care Act. https://www.speaker.gov/newsroom/7820

Thank you to @HoustonsFirst's Pastor @GreggMatte for inviting me to join you for an episode of 'Real Life, Real People.' Together, we talked about the importance of faith, family, and public service in my life. 

Watch a portion of the interview below 👇 http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1280893515568943105/img/dAjmyj6hOj3Zbbns.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1280893515568943105/vid/480x270/foglWp4xOLAg71vL.mp4?tag=13

This shameful decision shows that our fight for reproductive freedom in this country is far from over. We can’t stop until we’ve expanded reproductive health care to everyone—regardless of race, income level, and where they work. https://www.nytimes.com/2020/07/08/us/supreme-court-birth-control-obamacare.html

El Sen.Rubio emitió un comunicado tras la decisión de la Corte Suprema en el caso Little Sisters of the Poor Saints Peter & Paul Home v Pennsylvania dictando q el gobierno no puede obligar a las monjas a proporcionar anticonceptivos gratis a sus empleados
https://www.rubio.senate.gov/public/index.cfm?p=press-releases-es&id=7D848F76-6929-4116-91CA-7092EE8999A7 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EcbBJrLX0AAlBHB.png

Sen Rubio released a statement after #SCOTUS issued a decision in Little Sisters of the Poor Saints Peter and Paul Home v. Pennsylvania that the Little Sisters of the Poor cannot be forced to provide free birth control to their employees by the government

http://rubio.senate.gov/public/index.cfm/press-releases?ID=42A036F1-FE2D-4FB2-B9B3-47B7B34254B6 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EcbA7QMXkAAV6lo.png

RT @JulianCastro The scale of the evictions and homelessness crisis on the horizon is unprecedented and demands immediate action. 

Today at 3:30pm ET/2:30CT I’ll join @ewarren for an Instagram live conversation about how we prevent this looming crisis. https://twitter.com/ewarren/status/1280647396544872448 QT @ewarren Black and Brown communities have been hit hardest by this crisis across the board—and the impending spike in evictions will be the same unless we act. We need to extend the eviction moratorium and expand it to include more renters. I have a bill for that. Congress should pass it. https://twitter.com/washingtonpost/status/1280193050355130371

It's powerful seeing @JoeBiden and @AdyBarkan united in the fight for progress. If these two leaders—despite their different perspectives—can come together in common cause and common purpose, then it should inspire all of us to do the same. https://twitter.com/adybarkan/status/1280879315974930432 QT @AdyBarkan .@JoeBiden is everything Trump is not. He has turned loss into purpose: the purpose of public service.

Although he & I have different perspectives on the world, winning this election is essential.

Then we can continue our struggles for justice with a compassionate president. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1280851724639625216/img/PTm3CYAmfTauQdy2.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1280851724639625216/vid/480x270/yxiHF-NTK9lOWing.mp4?tag=13

You simply cannot tell Americans to just get used to people dying. But that’s exactly what this administration is doing. It’s beyond cruel. https://www.nbcnews.com/politics/politics-news/we-need-live-it-white-house-readies-new-message-nation-n1232884

This decision is a terrible reminder that we cannot let up in this fight. 

This isn’t just an attack on reproductive justice—it’s an attack on economic justice, too. https://twitter.com/PPact/status/1280869999482200064 QT @PPact Pay attention: The Supreme Court just ruled that your boss or your university can, based on their own objections, take away your birth control coverage. #SCOTUS #HandsOffMyBC http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EcaPvewWsAAEBdz.jpg

We can, and must, stop mass evictions.
 
Congress must pass my universal eviction moratorium bill to guarantee families won't lose their homes, and pass @SenSherrodBrown's emergency rental assistance bill, which would help them make their housing payments.
https://www.washingtonpost.com/business/2020/07/06/eviction-moratoriums-starwood/

.@FBI Director Christopher Wray is exactly right. The Chinese Communist Party uses global communications infrastructure built by CCP-controlled Chinese companies to spy on the US & our allies, steal intellectual property, target infrastructure, & undermine our national security. https://twitter.com/SecPompeo/status/1280633485187780610 QT @SecPompeo As @FBI Director Christopher Wray said at @HudsonInstitute: "The greatest long-term threat to our nation’s information and intellectual property, and to our economic vitality, is the counter intelligence and economic espionage threat from China." http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1280633099232083972/img/nJpU9nBqM4pnq5kd.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1280633099232083972/vid/480x270/wuMyilNI3MGfOsbA.mp4?tag=13

RT @MassDPH Help us stop the spread of COVID-19 by getting tested. Residents of these 8 communities with high rates of COVID-19 can get tested from July 10 - Aug 14 at no cost to you - even with no symptoms. All results are confidential. Learn more: https://www.mass.gov/StopTheSpread #covid19MA http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EcazHZFWAAASoJ5.png

For months & months, our doctors, nurses, cities, & states have begged for PPE. How many more of these stories need to pop up for Congress to pass my bill with @JanSchakowsky to publicly manufacture PPE & other medical supplies to stop these shortages? https://apnews.com/481d933b0caa6f5fc61f466c86d4777b

Outraged? Join us: http://supremecourtvoter.org

#USMCA was a big win for the Lone Star State & the 2.2M #TX jobs directly dependent on international trade. Drake is poised to be named the new president of the University of California and first Black leader in the system’s 152-year history. https://www.latimes.com/california/story/2020-07-07/michael-v-drake-is-expected-to-be-named-uc-president-first-black-leader-in-systems-152-year-history

Rubio joined many in calling for his release & remains committed to pressing for the release of American citizens & political prisoners wrongly detained abroad. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EcbWpN7WAAYec2s.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EcbWpN8XYAAi04L.png http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EcbWpOqXYAIlf5K.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EcbWpPPXYAM-eIO.jpg

Tune in!

Tune in now as I join @VotoLatino President @MariaTeresa1 to discuss what we need to do to ensure our voices are heard in November. 
https://www.pscp.tv/w/cdS-HTE3MjkzOTJ8MXZPeHdrV3ZYUlJ4QtNP8ptQ_0KKCF5GUMDDYvvbUOaVBk6rxRmx1yiAhqJ4

Of course, like in any collaborative effort, there are areas of negotiation and compromise.

But I do believe that the Climate Task Force effort meaningfully & substantively improved Biden’s positions.

I encourage you to engage the document critically and offer feedback or Qs.

The Climate Task Force has agreed to elevate Biden’s climate standards across the board & adopt a whole-of-gov mobilization, incl:
- Ambitious construction, mass transit, & transport, & ag standards+investment
- Creating millions of good jobs
- Centering climate justice standards

Today the 6 Biden-Sanders Unity Task Forces are unveiling final language.

The Climate Task Force accomplished a great deal. It was an honor to serve as co-chair w/ Sec. @JohnKerry.

Among the notable gains: we shaved *15 years* off Biden’s previous target for 100% clean energy. https://twitter.com/thehill/status/1280958104683905024 QT @thehill Sanders-Biden climate task force calls for carbon-free power by 2035 https://thehill.com/policy/energy-environment/506432-sanders-biden-climate-task-force-calls-for-carbon-free-electricity http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Ecbgm4VXQAA2HTO.png

Facebook’s oversight board should be doing everything in its power to prevent the mistakes of 2016 as we approach one of the most important elections of our lifetime.  

Refusing to meet this moment threatens our democracy.
https://www.forbes.com/sites/emmawoollacott/2020/07/08/facebook-oversight-board-may-start-work-too-late-to-prevent-election-misinformation/#67a8142730a0
I look forward to working with Vice President Biden to help him win this campaign and to move this country forward toward economic, racial, social, and environmental justice. 3/3

Though the end result isn't what I or my supporters would've written alone, the task forces have created a good policy blueprint that will move this country in a much-needed progressive direction and substantially improve the lives of working families throughout our country. 2/3

While @JoeBiden and I, and our supporters, have strong disagreements about some of the most important issues facing our country, we also understand that we must come together in order to defeat Donald Trump, the most dangerous president in modern American history. 1/3 https://twitter.com/MariannaNBCNews/status/1280944629781848065 QT @MariannaNBCNews BREAKING: @JoeBiden & @BernieSanders 6 policy task forces have released a hefty list of recommendations for the party's nominee & @DNC platform committee to consider. Details on the united effort to coalesce voters provided first to @NBCNews w/ @mikememoli https://www.nbcnews.com/politics/2020-election/democratic-task-forces-send-biden-progressive-policy-roadmap-n1233198

Now that our primary is behind us, we'll need to keep up the momentum through November. I'm counting on your support as we begin our general election campaign.

If you want to see me re-elected to the Senate, please consider chipping in today:
https://secure.actblue.com/donate/cab-social-200707?refcode=tw200708

It’s clear that @AdyBarkan and @JoeBiden share the empathy we need to tackle our broken health care system—especially when it comes to the dignity of long-term care. This conversation is more critical than ever and I’m grateful to fight alongside both of them. https://twitter.com/AdyBarkan/status/1280881577036255232 QT @AdyBarkan I know first hand the cost — and privilege — of receiving in-home care.

I'm thankful that @JoeBiden promised me he'll fight for long term services and supports that will allow more Americans to receive care where they want to be. At home. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1280619936294019079/img/kDm8EdwWqtxsJVt4.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1280619936294019079/vid/480x270/fR89WdV2KBWrp4Tu.mp4?tag=13

RT @JustinGerdes Here are the recommendations from the Biden-Sanders Unity Task Force on "Combating the Climate Crisis and Pursuing Environmental Justice," co-chaired by @AOC and @JohnKerry: https://joebiden.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/UNITY-TASK-FORCE-RECOMMENDATIONS.pdf (PDF)

One of the most important things we can be doing right now is registering people to vote. It's all on the line in November. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Ecbx45ZWsAAgnMB.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1280975730965446657/vid/480x270/Lat6ZfLiidXnenBu.mp4?tag=13

The @WHO can no longer be trusted. It had an obligation to warn the world about the #coronavirus. Instead, the organization helped the Chinese Communist Party cover it up, allowing the outbreak in Wuhan to become a global pandemic that’s taken more than 500,000 lives.

.@NationalService announced a more than $658,000 grant for @VolunteerFla to assist in recruiting volunteers. It’s great to see organizations supporting their neighbors in need and helping their community, especially as we continue to tackle these difficult times together.
@mmcauliff Sunrise was represented on the task force w/ @VarshPrakash

Today marks two months since @SenSanders, @SenMarkey and I introduced a bill to provide monthly $2,000 payments to help people get through the pandemic. And this crisis has only gotten worse.

Bills come every month—so should help from our government during a pandemic.

Our nation has a water safety, affordability, and sustainability crisis. Unless we take bold action, the climate crisis will continue to intensify water scarcity. Last week I introduced the Water for Tomorrow Act to help ensure a future with safe, clean, affordable water for all.

We have yet to get ahead of this virus. The consequences should not be taken lightly. 

We need to listen to leaders who are developing guidelines based on science and facts—not poll numbers.
https://www.cnn.com/2020/07/07/politics/fauci-coronavirus-pandemic-us-response/index.html

RT @TheTexanNews Sen. Ted Cruz launched a new political fund which will support 25 conservative congressional members or candidates by raising $100,000 for each. While the list spans multiple states, five Texas candidates will receive support from the fund. https://thetexan.news/sen-ted-cruz-launches-fund-supporting-conservative-candidates-in-texas-across-the-country/?utm_content=buffer0a9dd&utm_medium=social&utm_source=twitter.com&utm_campaign=buffer

Investors know the #ClimateCrisis threatens our communities & economic stability. Today I told @WSJOpinion: it's wrong for @SecGeneScalia to make it harder for retirement funds to invest with ESG factors in mind to protect against climate change risks. https://www.wsj.com/articles/eugene-scalia-off-the-mark-on-esg-investing-11594151143

At a coronavirus testing site in New Orleans, tests ran out 5 minutes after the doors opened. In Phoenix, people waited in their cars up to 8 hours to get tested. It’s outrageous that in July we still don’t have enough tests for everyone who needs it. 
https://www.nytimes.com/2020/07/06/us/coronavirus-test-shortage.html

RT @mattbc “they would rather live in their homes than be in a nursing home” – @JoeBiden promising @AdyBarkan that he will fight for home-based long term services and supports http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1280619936294019079/img/kDm8EdwWqtxsJVt4.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1280619936294019079/vid/480x270/fR89WdV2KBWrp4Tu.mp4?tag=13

There's an impending “eviction avalanche”—and Black people and people of color are going to be hit hardest. 

I spoke with @JulianCastro about why that is, and why it's so important for Congress to act immediately to stop it. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EccLpGGXgAAtLZN.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1281004871152480257/vid/320x320/2KKeP5TQgH2Ahl70.mp4?tag=13

Today's #SCOTUS decisions are significant victories in the fight to protect religious liberty for Americans. I’ll continue working with my colleagues to protect the freedom to worship and live according to one’s faith without fear of government overreach or oppression.

No one should look to Donald Trump or Betsy DeVos for public health advice – especially not the @CDCgov.

Schools cannot safely reopen for students and teachers this fall if the @SenateGOP keeps blocking the money schools and states need. https://www.washingtonpost.com/politics/trump-administration-officials-downplay-guidance-from-health-experts-as-they-push-to-reopen-schools/2020/07/08/236a6c5e-c13b-11ea-b178-bb7b05b94af1_story.html

Congratulations @OSUPrezDrake on your historic new role. Our students are in good hands. 
https://www.huffpost.com/entry/michael-drake-first-black-president-university-california_n_5f0523e7c5b6480493c89a20
